pluginstrument.author: Jason Tatum
pluginstrument.description:
Modification of Jason Tatum's original EGT & Fuel Flow
Brian McMullan 20180324, 20180711 fixed EGT needle for XP
Property for background off/on (default ON)
Property for dimming overlay (default OFF)
Preview: If want no background, open folder and rename preview1.png as preview.png
Compatible with the A2A Cessna 172 and the Airfoil Labs Cessna 172.
